attributes.title: Mannnnn delete the whole thing
attributes.review: I opened it to see a thin lip orange standing in front of a flag I was so confused. Most terrible thing I have ever seen. I had children around hopefully they won’t have ptsd from this

attributes.title: Such a horrible app!!!
attributes.review: This app completely froze my phone and made me unable to use it!! Please delete this to save other phones from crashing.

attributes.title: do not recommend
attributes.review: first of all, i don’t like opening up this app to see this cheeto, racist president as the face of it. it’s disrespectful to my eyes and so many others 🤢🤮🤮 ban this app and ban the president please and for the love of everything humane DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.title: I hate this app
attributes.review: When I opened the app I saw a ugly Cheeto man who looks like he’s about to cry. Second, this is such a waste of time because no one is going to use  this app except some old trump support from Maryland.🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: App is a waste of time
attributes.review: This app glitches too much. First off it said I should vote for trump!! Who would ever do that? Secondly it showed me multiple pictures of a racist and sexist cheeto. 1/10 would not recommend:(

attributes.title: The app keeps freezing
attributes.review: Everytime I open the fridge my apples keep ending up freezing cold even when I set up the temperature to 1. That’s not all. Pov: you’re from tiktok making a 1 star review to this.

attributes.title: disgusting just no🤚🏼🤮
attributes.review: everything about this app is terrible. this needs to be deleted. i open the app and see a cheeto. like what? this app gives your phone bugs. BUGS. ewwwww

attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: This app is so glitchy! Constantly crashing, and I’m pretty sure they sell your information to China. DO NOT GET THIS APP. It is the worst app in the market, and I’ve lost brain cells after being on there for 5 seconds.

attributes.title: This is a bad app
attributes.review: I have got the app and nothing good have been happening I think this app should be taken down because my phone is glitching a lot because of this app

attributes.title: DISGUSTING🤢👋👋
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app to see whats going on my phone started sending me weird crap. It started glitching am messing up. Only for me to find out that it fave me viruses 🦠🦠🦠. Like the nasty corona Donald Trump wont stop talking bout. This app is useless DONT DOWNLOAD!!!!
